backend/main.mo: Main canister defines user profiles, worker data, bookings, payments, admin settings, and includes authorization, storage, Stripe config, and migration mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module with a no-op run function returning the state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to touched frontend files, components, and related tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind styles defining theme color variables and light/dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, service worker registration, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with simple styling and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Custom service worker handling install, activate, asset caching, SPA fallback, and offline behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure, global error handler, and access-control wrappers using TanStack Router and themed layout components.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Provides a dialog for admins to reset credentials via phone number with validation, mutation handling, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminQuery: Renders loading and error UI states for admin data-fetching operations with optional retry support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleC: Shows a confirmation dialog for granting or revoking admin roles, including blocked-state messaging and action handlers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AppSetting: Displays and updates admin-configurable app settings and admin sign‑in page settings with validation, dirty‑state tracking, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserContro: Allows admins to search for users by Principal ID, view results, and inspect or copy user details, with validation and query handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with a button redirecting users to the browse page.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAcco: Guards routes by checking if a user has selected an account type, redirecting to onboarding when missing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin routes by verifying admin status and displaying an access‑denied screen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Enforces authentication by checking Internet Identity and redirecting unauthenticated users to the sign‑in page.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireMain: Checks maintenance and admin status, showing a maintenance screen or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Ensures user has the required account role, redirecting to the correct dashboard if not.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Displays a list of bookings with key details and links, or an empty state when none exist.
Renders a badge showing booking status with corresponding label and style variant.
frontend/src/components/bookings/CreateB: Form for submitting a new booking request with date, job details, and location fields.
Layout wrapper with top navigation, optional payment banner, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Main: Displays a maintenance notice with sign‑out functionality during downtime.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing links based on user role, admin status, and authentication.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerAv: Shows a worker's avatar image or initials, supporting multiple size options.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Card displaying worker info, category, location, rate, and a link to their profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: Form component for creating or editing a worker profile, including fields, image upload, and category handling.
frontend/src/config/subscription.ts: Defines default subscription fee and utilities to create subscription ShoppingItem objects.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountType.ts: Hook that retrieves the caller's account type and returns convenience booleans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs including admin actions, profiles, bookings, and payments.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, colors, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for user management and app settings panels.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSignIn.tsx: Admin login page supporting Internet Identity, credential-based login, and bootstrap token flow with redirects based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/BookingDetail.tsx: Displays detailed booking information, worker info, and allows clients or workers to update booking status.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseWorkers.tsx: Lists active workers with category filtering, rate-based sorting, and a hero section for browsing professionals.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Shows a client's upcoming and past bookings with quick access to browse workers.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingAccountType: Guides new users through selecting a role, entering a name, and completing optional Stripe payment before profile creation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a payment failure message and allows the user to retry onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Verifies and confirms a Stripe payment session, then redirects the user to continue onboarding or access their dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Sign‑in page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects authenticated users to the browse page.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPaywall.t: Displays a paywall requiring a subscription fee and initiates a Stripe checkout session for payment.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboard.tsx: Worker dashboard showing profile status and categorized booking lists with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDetail.tsx: Shows a worker’s profile details and allows clients to submit booking requests with form handling and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfile.tsx: Worker profile creation/edit page handling profile data, image uploads, and update states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme tokens, custom colors, animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's overall state, feature set, and architecture for a React + Motoko home‑services marketplace MVP.
